segments.text: I glance at the kitchen scene and spot the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes, completely absorbed in her work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the faucet is overflowing onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cascading down like a waterfall, flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is wet, but she keeps going without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the other side, a boy is on a stool by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to grab from the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unstable, legs all spread out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll come crashing down with cookies flying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl beside him has her arm up, begging for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're conspiring together, so cute but so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is blooming nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between calm outside and disaster inside is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the dangers brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR
